name: bookkart
description: An REST based Web service that supports operations such as creating, inserting, updating, deleting and viewing books and its categories
author: Ahmed Fouzan (ahmedfouzan@gmail.com), Anagh Hegde (h.v.anagh@gmail.com), Ganesh Bhargav C H (ganeshbhargavch@gmail.com), Manoj Vignesh K M (kmmanoj1990@gmail.com)
